titleStmt.title: The lot or portion of the righteous A comfortable sermon, preached at the Cathedrall Church of Glocester, vpon the fift day of August: Anno Domini. 1615. By Richard Web, preacher of Gods word at Rodborough in Glocestershyre.
titleStmt.author: Webb, Richard, preacher of God's word.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho: Creede, for Roger Iackson, and are to be solde at his shoppe in Fleetstreet, ouer against the Conduit,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
